message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $150.  It's a steal you don't want to miss!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a good deal, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $90 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product, can we meet somewhere in between?
